terms.definition: the objectively existing world in the broadest sense
a {particle} that is not composed of other {particles}
undividible {elementary particle}, known at the moment
any substance in {reality} that has {mass} and {volume}
something that can be seen as separate from any other objects
a common characteristic that does not exist by itself, but the possession of which can be attributed to many different {entities}
ability of an {entity} to interact with {reality}
continuous {sequence} of {existence} and changes occuring in {reality}
{set} of independent {properties} need for description of {entity}, или количество степеней свободы системы.
three-dimentional extent of {reality} in which {existing} {entities} have relative position and direction continuous {sequence} of occuring {existence} and changes in {reality}
